text: Gopal Swarup Pathak (24 February 1896 â€“ 4 October 1982) was the fourth Vice President of India from August 1969 to August 1974. He was the first Indian Vice President not to succeed to President, which was something all three of his predecessors did. == Other websites == Category:1896 births Category:1982 deaths Category:Governors of Karnataka Category:Vice presidents of India
title: Gopal Swarup Pathak
